articles.title: Get 6 months of Apple Music subscription free with new iPhones and eligible audio devices - News9 LIVE
articles.description: Apple has announced to give six months of free subscription to Apple Music for free with new iPhones and eligible audio devices.
articles.content: Apple is offering a free subscription to Apple Music for six months with eligible audio devices from Apple as well as the purchase of a new iPhone. Notably, the offer is valid for new users of the mu… [+1783 chars]
